attributes.action: abolish the ability for MP's to claim at tax payers expense any luxury items for their homes or a second mortgage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the tax payers of this country are struggling to pay for the cost of general living with the rising cost of fuel, taxes, mortgages (not being able to afford luxury items for their first and only home) it is obscene to think that MP's have just voted to maintain their ability to claim for such things as well as a mortgage on a second home. They should also have to submit receipted expense claims for job related expenses like everyone else

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
